tool_description: API that provides drinking-related questions and challenges for entertainment purposes.

api_list.name: Get random question
api_list.description: Allows you to get a random drinking question, with an option to specify the type of the challenge.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Choose the type of question from: funny or dirty.

api_list.name: Get random challenge
api_list.description: Allows you to get a random drinking challenge, with an option to specify the type of the challenge.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Choose the type of challenge from: funny, dirty, or sport.
